channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 40 Techy Gifts Under $100 That We Tested and Love
item.description: Score a great gift for everyone on your list without breaking the bank. Every one of these gifts comes WIRED-recommended.

item.title: These 5 Posture Corrector Picks Will Straighten You Out (2025)
item.description: You’re hunched over your desk and phone for hours. We rounded up gadgets, a DIY trick, and even some yoga advice to help you straighten up.

item.title: Byju’s founder to appeal U.S. court order to pay over $1B in bankruptcy case
item.description: A U.S. bankruptcy court has ordered Byju's founder Byju Raveendran to pay over $1.07 billion in a case over missing company funds.

item.title: 13 Best MagSafe Power Banks for iPhones (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Keep your iPhone or Qi2 Android phone topped up with one of these WIRED-tested Qi2 or MagSafe portable chargers.

item.title: Trump administration might not fight state AI regulations after all
item.description: A Trump administration order targeting state-level AI regulation is reportedly on hold.

item.title: The Best Chef’s Knives of 2025. We Tested Nearly Two Dozen to Find Our Favorites
item.description: The chef’s knife is the workhorse of the kitchen. We sliced, diced, and minced to find the best for every home chef.
